Detailed Description

This class defines an interface for receiving socket events.

Since Mercury runs the event loop, it is useful to be able to register additional file descriptors, and receive callbacks when they are ready for IO.

See also:
EventDispatcher::registerFileDescriptor

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

virtual int Mercury::InputNotificationHandler::handleInputNotification ( int  fd  )  [pure virtual]

This method is called when a file descriptor is ready for reading.

Parameters:
fd The file descriptor
Returns:
The return value is ignored. Implementors should return 0.

Implemented in TelnetConnection, Mercury::EventPoller, and WatcherNub.
